item.title: Pitzer College
item.description: Founded in 1963, Pitzer College is a nationally ranked undergraduate college of the liberal arts and sciences located in Los Angeles County. A member of The Claremont Colleges, Pitzer offers a distinctive approach to a liberal education by linking intellectual inquiry with interdisciplinary studies, cultural immersion, social responsibility and community involvement.
